# Olympics 100m & 200m Dash Over 100 Years

I scraped all available data for the 100m and 200m dashes for every time in every heat of the Olympics over 100 years. Below I have subdivided the race data by event and gender to visualize the change in time over the years.

```{r}

#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Code"

oly_women_clean <- read_csv("/Users/rochellerafn/RStudio Files/oly_women_clean.csv")
oly_men_clean <- read_csv("/Users/rochellerafn/RStudio Files/oly_men_clean.csv")

oly_men_100m <- oly_men_clean %>%
  filter(Event == "100 metres")%>%
  arrange(desc(Year))

oly_women_100m <- oly_women_clean %>%
  filter(Event == "100 metres")%>%
  arrange(desc(Year))

oly_men_200m <- oly_men_clean %>%
  filter(Event == "200 metres")%>%
  arrange(desc(Year))

oly_women_200m <- oly_women_clean %>%
  filter(Event == "200 metres")%>%
  arrange(desc(Year))
```
